languages.text: "Ты... действительно не понимаешь, элантах? Мне больно напоминать о том, как я готова была разменять твою жизнь на жалкие крупицы информации, что бросил мне под ноги Маражай. А провидцы... из этих крупиц им под силу взрастить целый лес истины".

traits.locale_text: "Ты... действительно не понимаешь, элантах? Мне больно напоминать о том, как я готова была разменять твою жизнь на жалкие крупицы информации, что бросил мне под ноги Маражай. А провидцы... из этих крупиц им под силу взростить целый лес истины".

languages.text: "Do you... truly not understand, elantach? It pains me to recall how I was willing to exchange your life for the pathetic scraps of information Marazhai scattered at my feet. But the Farseers... with those scraps, they have the ability to grow an entire forest of truth."
languages.original_text: "Ты... действительно не понимаешь, элантах? Мне больно напоминать о том, как я готова была разменять твою жизнь на жалкие крупицы информации, что бросил мне под ноги Маражай. А провидцы... из этих крупиц им под силу взрастить целый лес истины".

traits.locale_text: "Do you... truly not understand, elantach? It pains me to recall how I was willing to exchange your life for the pathetic scraps of information Marazhai scattered at my feet. But the Farseers... with those scraps, they have the ability to grow an entire forest of truth."

"Do you... truly not understand, elantach? It pains me to recall how I was willing to exchange your life for the pathetic scraps of information Marazhai scattered at my feet. But the Farseers... with those scraps, they have the ability to grow an entire forest of truth."

"Do you... truly not understand, elantach? It pains me to recall how I was willing to exchange your life for the pathetic scraps of information Marazhai scattered at my feet. But the Farseers... with those scraps, they have the ability to grow an entire forest of truth."

"Do you... truly not understand, elantach? It pains me to recall how I was willing to exchange your life for the pathetic scraps of information Marazhai scattered at my feet. But the Farseers... with those scraps, they have the ability to grow an entire forest of truth."

languages.text: “你……真的不明白吗，外界人？一想到我曾打算以你的生命来换取玛拉斋丢在我脚下的信息碎片，我就充满了痛苦。但那些先知……他们可以利用这些碎片，种植出一整片真相的丛林。”
languages.original_text: "Do you... truly not understand, elantach? It pains me to recall how I was willing to exchange your life for the pathetic scraps of information Marazhai scattered at my feet. But the Farseers... with those scraps, they have the ability to grow an entire forest of truth."

traits.locale_text: “你……真的不明白吗，外界人？一想到我曾打算以你的生命来换取玛拉斋丢在我脚下的信息碎片，我就充满了痛苦。但那些先知……他们可以利用这些碎片，种植出一整片真相的丛林。”

languages.text: «¿De verdad... no lo entiendes, elantach? Me duele recordar que estaba dispuesta a intercambiar tu vida por los patéticos ápices de información que Marazhai arrojó a mis pies. Pero los videntes... son capaces de convertir esos ápices en un bosque entero de verdad».
languages.original_text: "Do you... truly not understand, elantach? It pains me to recall how I was willing to exchange your life for the pathetic scraps of information Marazhai scattered at my feet. But the Farseers... with those scraps, they have the ability to grow an entire forest of truth."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad... no lo entiendes, elantach? Me duele recordar que estaba dispuesta a intercambiar tu vida por los patéticos ápices de información que Marazhai arrojó a mis pies. Pero los videntes... son capaces de convertir esos ápices en un bosque entero de verdad».

languages.text: 「わからないのか…エランタ？マラズハイが目の前にちらつかせたかすかな情報の切れ端と、あなたの命を引き換えにしたことを思い出すと胸が痛む。でも、先見司たちは…その切れ端があれば、真実の森を築く力がある」
languages.original_text: "Do you... truly not understand, elantach? It pains me to recall how I was willing to exchange your life for the pathetic scraps of information Marazhai scattered at my feet. But the Farseers... with those scraps, they have the ability to grow an entire forest of truth."

traits.locale_text: 「わからないのか…エランタ？マラズハイが目の前にちらつかせたかすかな情報の切れ端と、あなたの命を引き換えにしたことを思い出すと胸が痛む。でも、先見司たちは…その切れ端があれば、真実の森を築く力がある」

languages.text: "Begreift Ihr es wirklich nicht, Elantach? Die Erinnerung schmerzt mich. Daran, dass ich gewillt war, Euer Leben gegen die jämmerlichen Fetzen Wissen einzutauschen, die Marazhai mir vor die Füße warf. Doch die Runenpropheten ... sie können aus diesen Fetzen einen ganzen Wald der Wahrheit erwachsen lassen."
languages.original_text: "Do you... truly not understand, elantach? It pains me to recall how I was willing to exchange your life for the pathetic scraps of information Marazhai scattered at my feet. But the Farseers... with those scraps, they have the ability to grow an entire forest of truth."

traits.locale_text: "Begreift Ihr es wirklich nicht, Elantach? Die Erinnerung schmerzt mich. Daran, dass ich gewillt war, Euer Leben gegen die jämmerlichen Fetzen Wissen einzutauschen, die Marazhai mir vor die Füße warf. Doch die Runenpropheten ... sie können aus diesen Fetzen einen ganzen Wald der Wahrheit erwachsen lassen."

languages.text: « Vous... Vous ne comprenez vraiment pas, elantach ? Il m'est douloureux de me rappeler que j'étais prête à échanger votre vie contre les misérables miettes d'informations que Marazhai avait jetées à mes pieds. Mais les Grands Prophètes... Avec ces miettes, ils sont capables de faire pousser une forêt entière de vérité. »
languages.original_text: "Do you... truly not understand, elantach? It pains me to recall how I was willing to exchange your life for the pathetic scraps of information Marazhai scattered at my feet. But the Farseers... with those scraps, they have the ability to grow an entire forest of truth."

traits.locale_text: « Vous... Vous ne comprenez vraiment pas, elantach ? Il m'est douloureux de me rappeler que j'étais prête à échanger votre vie contre les misérables miettes d'informations que Marazhai avait jetées à mes pieds. Mais les Grands Prophètes... Avec ces miettes, ils sont capables de faire pousser une forêt entière de vérité. »

languages.text: "Acaba... Gerçekten anlamıyor musun elantach? Marazhai'ın vereceği birkaç bilgi kırıntısı karşılığında canını teslim etmeye nasıl da razı olduğumu hatırladıkça acı çekiyorum. Oysa Ötesezenler... Ötesezenler, o bilgi kırıntılarıyla hakikatin ta kendisine ulaşabilir."
languages.original_text: "Do you... truly not understand, elantach? It pains me to recall how I was willing to exchange your life for the pathetic scraps of information Marazhai scattered at my feet. But the Farseers... with those scraps, they have the ability to grow an entire forest of truth."

traits.locale_text: "Acaba... Gerçekten anlamıyor musun elantach? Marazhai'ın vereceği bölük pörçük bilgiler karşılığında canını takas etmeye nasıl da razı olduğumu hatırladıkça acı çekiyorum. Oysa Ötesezenler... Ötesezenler, o bölük pörçük bilgilerle hakikatin ta kendisine ulaşabilir."
